original: Idāni mahābodhicariyabhāvenapi dānaguṇaṃ dassetuṃ “dānaṃ nāmeta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: idāni mahā bodhi cariya bhāvena api dāna guṇam dassetum dānam nāma etat tiādi vuttam tattha

original: ovādaṃ deti. Idāni yā lokiyā lokuttarā ca ukkaṃsagatā sampattiyo, tā sabbā dānatoyeva

original: pavattantīti dassento “dānañhī”tiādimāha. Tattha sakkamārabrahmasampattiyo attahitāya

analyzed: nekkhamme ānisaṃsanti ettha yattakā kāmesu ādīnavā tad paṭipakkhato tattakā nekkhamme

original: 3-4. Assājānīyasuttādivaṇṇanā

original: katanti viññāyati. “Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato”ti idaṃ abhidhamme katthacipi
analyzed: katanti viññāyati ajjhatta rūpānam an abhibhavanīya to ti idam abhidhamme katthacipi

original: “ajjhattaṃ rūpāni passatī”ti avatvā sabbattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti,
analyzed: ajjhattam rūpāni passati iti avatvā sabbattha yat vuttam bahiddhā rūpāni passati iti

original: tassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Tena yaṃ aññahetukaṃ, taṃ tena hetunā vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana desanāvilāsahetukaṃ
analyzed: tassa kāraṇa vacanam tena yam añña hetukam tam tena hetunā vuttam yam pana desanā vilāsa hetukam

original: ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāya eva abhidhamme vacanaṃ, na tassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ maggitabbanti dasseti.
analyzed: ajjhattam arūpa saññitāya eva abhidhamme vacanam na tassa aññam kāraṇam maggitabbanti dasseti

original: Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyatā ca tesaṃ bahiddhārūpānaṃ viya avibhūtattā desanāvilāso
analyzed: ajjhatta rūpānam an abhibhavanīya tā ca tesam bahiddhā rūpānam viya avibhūta ttā desanā vilāsaḥ

original: ca yathāvuttavavatthānavasena veditabbo veneyyajjhāsayavasena vijjamānapariyāyakathābhāvato.
analyzed: ca yathā vutta vavatthāna vasena veditabbaḥ veneyya jhāsaya vasena vijjamāna pariyāya kathā bhāvataḥ

original: “Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti eteneva siddhattā na nīlādiabhibhāyatanāni vattabbānīti ce?
analyzed: suvaṇṇa dubbaṇṇāni iti etena iva siddha ttā na nīla ādi abhibhāyatanāni vattabbāni iti ce

original: Taṃ na. Nīlādīsu katādhikārānaṃ nīlādibhāvasseva abhibhavanakāraṇattā. Na hi tesaṃ
analyzed: tam na nīla ādīsu kata adhikārānam nīla ādi bhāvassa iva abhibhavana kāraṇa ttā na hi tesam

original: parisuddhāparisuddhavaṇṇānaṃ parittatā vā appamāṇatā vā abhibhavanakāraṇaṃ, atha
analyzed: parisuddha aparisuddha vaṇṇānam paritta tā vā appamāṇa tā vā abhibhavana kāraṇam atha

original: kho nīlādibhāvo evāti. Etesu ca parittādikasiṇarūpesu yaṃ yaṃ caritassa imāni abhibhāyatanāni
analyzed: nīla ādi bhāvaḥ eva ati etesu ca paritta ādi kasiṇa rūpesu yam yam caritassa imāni

original: ijjhanti, taṃ dassetuṃ “imesu panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sabbasaṅgāhikavasenāti nīlavaṇṇanīlanidassananīlanibhāsānaṃ
analyzed: ijjhanti tam dassetum imesu pana atiādi vuttam sabba saṅgāhika vasena āti nīla vaṇṇa nīla nidassana nīla nibhāsānam

original: sādhāraṇavasena. Vaṇṇavasenāti sabhāvavaṇṇavasena. Nidassanavasenāti passitabbatāvasena
analyzed: sādhāraṇa vasena vaṇṇa vasena ati sabhāva vaṇṇa vasena nidassana vasena ati passitabba tā vasena

original: cakkhuviññāṇādiviññāṇavīthiyā gahetabbatāvasena. Obhāsavasenāti sappabhāsatāya avabhāsanavasena.
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa ādi viññāṇa vīthiyāḥ gahetabba tā vasena obhāsa vasena ati sa ppabhāsa tāya avabhāsana vasena

original: Icchāsuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: icchā sutta ādi vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 6. Vimokkhasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: vimokkha sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 66. Chaṭṭhe kenaṭṭhenāti kena sabhāvena. Sabhāvo hi ñāṇena yāthāvato araṇīyato ñātabbato
analyzed: chaṭṭhe kenaṭṭhena ati kena sabhāvena sabhāvaḥ hi ñāṇena yāthāvataḥ araṇīyataḥ ñātabbataḥ

original: “attho”ti vuccati, so eva ttha-kārassa ṭṭha-kāraṃ katvā “aṭṭho”ti vutto. Adhimuccanaṭṭhenāti

analyzed: adhikam sa visesam muccana ṭṭhena etena sati pi sabbassa api rūpāvacara jhānassa vikkhambhana vasena

original: paṭipakkhato vimuttabhāve yena bhāvanāvisesena taṃ jhānaṃ sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhato

original: vimuccitvā pavattati, so bhāvanāviseso dīpito. Bhavati hi samānajātiyuttopi bhāvanāvisesena
analyzed: vimuccitvā pavattati saḥ bhāvanā visesaḥ dīpitaḥ bhavati hi samāna jāti yuttaḥ api bhāvanā visesena

original: pavattiākāraviseso. Yathā taṃ saddhāvimuttato diṭṭhippattassa, tathā paccanīkadhammehi
analyzed: pavatti ākāra visesaḥ yathā tam saddhā vimuttataḥ diṭṭhi ppattassa tathā paccanīka dhammehi

original: suṭṭhu vimuttatāya eva aniggahitabhāvena nirāsaṅkatāya abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimuccanaṭṭhenapi
analyzed: suṭṭhu vimutta tāya eva a niggahita bhāvena nirāsaṅka tāya abhirati vasena suṭṭhu adhimuccana ṭṭhena pi

original: vimokkho. Tenāha “ārammaṇe cā”tiādi. Ayaṃ panatthoti ayaṃ adhimuccanaṭṭho pacchime
analyzed: tena āha ārammaṇe ca atiādi ayam pana atthaḥ ti ayam adhimuccana ṭṭho pacchime

original: vimokkhe nirodhe natthi. Kevalo vimuttaṭṭho eva tattha labbhati, taṃ sayameva parato vakkhati.
analyzed: vimokkhe nirodhe na atthi kevalaḥ vimutta ṭṭhaḥ eva tattha labbhati tam sayam eva paratas vakkhati

original: Rūpīti yenāyaṃ sasantatipariyāpannena rūpena samannāgato, taṃ yassa jhānassa hetubhāvena

original: tadeva sasantatipariyāpannarūpassa vasena paṭiladdhajjhānaṃ idha paramatthato rūpibhāvasādhakanti

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha “ajjhatta”ntiādi. Rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ uttarapadalopena. Rūpānīti
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam tena āha ajjhatta ntiādi rūpa jjhānam rūpam uttara pada lopena rūpāni iti

original: panettha purimapadalopo daṭṭhabbo. Tena vuttaṃ “nīlakasiṇādīni rūpānī”ti. Rūpe kasiṇarūpe
analyzed: pana ittha purima pada lopaḥ daṭṭhabbo tena vuttam nīla kasiṇa ādīni rūpāni iti rūpe kasiṇa rūpe

analyzed: saññā rūpa saññā sā etassa atthi iti rūpa saññī saññā sīsena jhānam vadati tad paṭipakkhena

analyzed: arūpa saññī tena āha ajjhattam na rūpa saññī itiādi

original: Anto appanāyaṃ “subha”nti ābhogo natthīti iminā pubbābhogavasena tathā adhimutti

original: siyāti dasseti. Evañhettha tathāvattabbatāpatticodanā anavaṭṭhānā hoti. Yasmā suvisuddhesu

original: nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu tattha katādhikārānaṃ abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimuccanaṭṭho

analyzed: tena tena pariyāyena vutta ttā na virujjhati iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Sabbasoti anavasesato. Na hi catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ ekadesopi tattha avasissati.
analyzed: sabbaso ti anavasesataḥ na hi catunnam arūpa kkhandhānam eka desaḥ api tattha avasissati

original: cetiya”nti paññāyittha. Sārandadassa nāma yakkhassa vasitaṭṭhānaṃ, cāpālassa nāma

analyzed: bhāvan upacayam gamitā tena āha su vaḍḍhitā iti suṭṭhu samāraddhā iti iddhi bhāvanāya

original: sikhāppattiyā sammadeva saṃsevitā.
analyzed: sikhāppattiyā sammad eva saṃsevitā

original: Aniyamenāti “yassa kassacī”ti aniyamavacanena. Niyametvāti “tathāgatassā”ti sarūpadassanena

original: niyametvā. Āyuppamāṇanti paramāyuppamāṇaṃ vadati. Kiṃ panettha paramāyu nāma, kathaṃ
analyzed: niyametvā āyu pamāṇam ti parama āyu pamāṇam vadati kim pana itthā parama āyu nāma katham

original: purimasiddhabhavapatthanūpanissayavasena sarīrāvayavavaṇṇasaṇṭhānappamāṇādivisesā
viya taṃtaṃgatinikāyādīsu yebhuyyena niyataparicchedo gabbhaseyyakakāmāvacaradevarūpāvacarasattānaṃ

original: So yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattāvaṭṭhāyīnampi attano sahajātānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ṭhapanākāravuttitāya
analyzed: saḥ yathāsakam khaṇa matta avaṭṭhāyīnam pi attano sahajātānam rūpa arūpa dhammānam ṭhapana ākāra vutti tāya

original: pavattanakāni rūpārūpajīvitindriyāni yasmā na kevalaṃ tesaṃ khaṇaṭhitiyā eva kāraṇabhāvena
analyzed: pavattanakāni rūpa arūpa jīvita indriyāni yasmā na kevalam tesam khaṇa ṭhitiyāḥ eva kāraṇa bhāvena

analyzed: anupālakāni atha kho a viccheda hetu bhāvena api

original: tasmā āyuhetukattā kāraṇūpacārena āyu, ukkaṃsaparicchedavasena paramāyūti ca vuccati.
analyzed: tasmai kāraṇa upacārena āyu ukkaṃsa pariccheda vasena ca vuccati

original: Taṃ pana devānaṃ nerayikānaṃ uttarakurukānañca niyataparicchedaṃ. Uttarakurukānaṃ
analyzed: tam pana devānam nerayikānam uttarakurukānam ca niyata paricchedam uttarakurukānam

analyzed: pana ekanta niyata paricchedam eva avasiṭṭha manussa peta tiracchānānam pana cira ṭṭhiti saṃvattanika kamma bahule

original: kāle taṃkammasahitasantānajanitasukkasoṇitapaccayānaṃ taṃmūlakānañca candasūriyasamavisamaparivattanādijanitautuāhārādisamavisamapaccayānañca
analyzed: kāle tad kamma sahita santāna janita sukka soṇita paccayānam tad mūlakānam ca canda sūriya sama visama parivattana ādi janita otu āhāra ādi sama visama paccayānam ca

original: vasena cirācirakālato aniyataparicchedaṃ, tassa ca yathā purimasiddhabhavapatthanāvasena
analyzed: vasena cira acira kālataḥ aniyata paricchedam tassa ca yathā purima siddha bhava patthanā vasena

original: taṃtaṃgatinikāyādīsu vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivisesaniyamo siddho dassanānussavādīhi, tathā

original: ādito gahaṇasiddhiyā. Evaṃ tāsu tāsu upapattīsu nibbattasattānaṃ yebhuyyena samappamāṇaṭṭhitikālaṃ
analyzed: āditas gahaṇa siddhiyāḥ evam tāsu tāsu upapattīsu nibbatta sattānam yebhuyyena samappamāṇa ṭṭhiti kālam

original: dassanānussavehi labhitvā taṃparamataṃ ajjhosāya pavattitabhavapatthanāvasena ādito
analyzed: dassana anussavehi labhitvā taṃ para matam ajjhosāya pavattita bhava patthanā vasena āditas

original: paricchedaniyamo veditabbo. Yasmā pana kammaṃ tāsu tāsu upapattīsu yathā taṃtaṃupapattiniyatavaṇṇādinibbattane

original: samatthaṃ, evaṃ niyatāyuparicchedāsu upapattīsu paricchedātikkamena vipākanibbattane
analyzed: samattham evam niyata āyu paricchedāsu upapattīsu pariccheda atikkamena vipāka nibbattane

original: samatthaṃ na hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle yaṃ manussānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ, taṃ
analyzed: samattham na hoti tasmai vuttam tasmin tasmin kāle yam manussānam āyu ppamāṇam tam

original: paripuṇṇaṃ karonto tiṭṭheyyā”ti.
analyzed: paripuṇṇam karontaḥ tiṭṭheyya ati

original: Mahāsīvatthero pana “mahābodhisattānaṃ carimabhave paṭisandhidāyino kammassa asaṅkhyeyyāyukatāsaṃvattanasamatthataṃ

original: hadaye ṭhapetvā buddhānañca āyusaṅkhārassa parissayavikkhambhanasamatthatā pāḷiyaṃ
analyzed: hadaye ṭhapetvā buddhānam ca āyu saṅkhārassa parissaya vikkhambhana samattha tā pāḷiyam

original: āgatā evāti imaṃ bhaddakappameva tiṭṭheyyā”ti avoca. Khaṇḍiccādīhi abhibhuyyatīti
analyzed: āgatā eva ati imam bhadda kappam eva tiṭṭheyya ati avoca khaṇḍicca ādīhi abhibhuyyati iti

original: etena yathā iddhibalena jarāya na paṭighāto, evaṃ tena maraṇassapi na paṭighātoti
analyzed: etena yathā iddhi balena jarāya na paṭighātaḥ evam tena maraṇassa api na paṭighātaḥ ti

original: atthato āpannamevāti. “Kva saro khitto, kva ca nipatito”ti aññathā vuṭṭhitenapi theravādena

original: aṭṭhakathāvacanameva samatthitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha “yo pana vuccati…pe… niyāmita”nti.
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā vacanam eva samatthitanti daṭṭhabbam tena āha yaḥ pana niyāmitanti

original: Oḷārike nimitteti thūle saññuppādane. Thūlasaññuppādanañhetaṃ “tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa”nti
analyzed: oḷārike nimitte iti thūle saññuppādane thūla saññuppādanam ha etam tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappanti

original: sakalaṃ kappaṃ avaṭṭhānayācanāya, yadidaṃ “yassa kassaci, ānanda, cattāro iddhipādā
analyzed: sakalam kappam avaṭṭhāna yācanāya yat idam yassa kassaci ānanda cattāraḥ iddhipādāḥ

original: bhāvitā”tiādinā aññāpadesena attano caturiddhipādabhāvanānubhāvena kappaṃ avaṭṭhānasamatthatāvibhāvanaṃ.
analyzed: bhāvitā ati ādinā añña apadesena attano catur iddhipāda bhāvanā anubhāvena kappam avaṭṭhāna samattha tā vibhāvanam

original: Obhāseti pākaṭavacane. Pākaṭavacanañhetaṃ, yadidaṃ pariyāyaṃ muñcitvā ujukameva attano

original: vā aññopi yo koci puthujjano. Puthujjanaggahaṇañcettha yathā sabbena sabbaṃ appahīnavipallāso

analyzed: kata nimitta ubhāsam sabbasas na sallakkhesi iti dassana attham tena āha māraḥ hi itiādi

analyzed: vipallāsā pahīnā tathā api yathāvuttānam catunnam vipallāsānam appahīna bhāvena assa ati

analyzed: maraṇam eva siyā kim sakkhissati na sakkhissati iti adhippāyaḥ kasmā na sakkhissati

analyzed: nimittam tathā pana pariyāyam muñcitvā ujukam eva attanaḥ adhippāya vibhāvanam obhāsaḥ

original: Jānantoyevāti mārena pariyuṭṭhitabhāvaṃ jānantoyeva. Attano aparādhahetuto sattānaṃ

analyzed: buddha anubhāvena pana jānāti

analyzed: guṇa māraṇena māreti virāga vibandhanena vā jāti nimitta tāya tattha tattha jātam mārento

original: viya niyatakiccassa aṭṭhamasattāhassa nāma labbhanato. Sattamasattāhassa hi parato
analyzed: viya niyata kiccassa aṭṭhama sattāhassa nāma labbhanato sattama sattāhassa hi paratas

analyzed: hutvā ṭhitaḥ cintesi handa dāna aham naṃ upāyena parinibbāpessāmi evam assa manorathaḥ

original: aññathattaṃ gamissati, mama ca manoratho ijjhissatī”ti. Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhagavantaṃ
analyzed: aññathattam gamissati mama ca manorathaḥ ijjhissati iti evam pana cintetvā bhagavantam

original: upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito “parinibbātu dāni, bhante, bhagavā”tiādinā parinibbānaṃ
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā ekamantam ṭhitaḥ parinibbātu dāni bhante bhagavā ati ādinā parinibbānam

original: yāci. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “aṭṭhame sattāhe”tiādi. Tattha ajjāti āyusaṅkhārossajjanadivasaṃ
analyzed: yāci tam sandhāya vuttam aṭṭhame sattāhe tiādi tattha ajjā ti āyu saṅkhāra ussajjana divasam

original: sandhāyāha. Bhagavā cassa atibandhanādhippāyaṃ jānantopi taṃ anāvikatvā parinibbānassa
analyzed: sandhāya āha bhagavā ca assa atibandhana adhippāyam jānantaḥ api tam an āvikatvā parinibbānassa

original: akālabhāvameva pakāsento yācanaṃ paṭikkhipi. Tenāha “na tāvāha”ntiādi.
analyzed: akāla bhāvam eva pakāsentaḥ yācanam tena āha na tau aham itiādi

original: Maggavasena byattāti saccasampaṭivedhaveyyattiyena byattā. Tatheva vinītāti maggavaseneva
analyzed: magga vasena byattā ati sacca sampaṭivedha veyyattiyena byattā tathā iva vinītā ati magga vasena iva

original: kilesānaṃ samucchedavinayena vinītā. Tathā visāradāti ariyamaggādhigameneva satthusāsane
analyzed: kilesānam samuccheda vinayena vinītā tathā visāradā ati ariya magga adhigamena iva satthu sāsane

original: vesārajjappattiyā visāradā, sārajjakarānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchādipāpadhammānaṃ vigamena
analyzed: vesārajja ppattiyā visāradā sārajja karānam diṭṭhi vicikicchā ādi pāpa dhammānam vigamena

original: visāradabhāvaṃ pattāti attho. Yassa sutassa vasena vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇaṃ sambhavati,
analyzed: visārada bhāvam pattā ti attho yassa sutassa vasena vaṭṭa dukkhataḥ nissaraṇam sambhavati

original: taṃ idha ukkaṭṭhaniddesena sutanti adhippetanti āha “tepiṭakavasenā”ti. Tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ
analyzed: tam idha ukkaṭṭha niddesena sutanti adhippetanti āha tepiṭaka vasena ati tiṇṇam piṭakānam

original: samūho tepiṭakaṃ, tīṇi vā piṭakāni tipiṭakaṃ, tipiṭakameva tepiṭakaṃ, tassa vasena.
analyzed: samūhaḥ tepiṭakam tīṇi vā piṭakāni ti piṭakam ti piṭakam eva tepiṭakam tassa vasena

original: Tamevāti yaṃ taṃ tepiṭakaṃ sotabbabhāvena “suta”nti vuttaṃ, tameva. Dhammanti pariyattidhammaṃ.
analyzed: tam eva ati yam tam tepiṭakam sotabba bhāvena sutan ti vuttam tam eva dhammam ti pariyatti dhammam

original: Dhārentīti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya avinassantaṃ katvā suppaguṇasuppavattibhāvena
analyzed: dhārenti iti suvaṇṇa bhājane pakkhitta sīha vasam viya avinassantam katvā suppaguṇa suppavatti bhāvena

original: dhārenti hadaye ṭhapenti. Iti pariyattidhammavasena bahussutadhammadharabhāvaṃ dassetvā
analyzed: dhārenti hadaye ṭhapenti iti pariyatti dhamma vasena bahussuta dhammadhara bhāvam dassetvā

original: idāni paṭivedhadhammavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ariyadhammassāti
analyzed: idāni paṭivedha dhamma vasena api tam dassetum atha vā atiādi vuttam ariya dhammassa

original: maggaphaladhammassa, navavidhassapi vā lokuttaradhammassa. Anudhammabhūtanti adhigamāya
analyzed: magga phala dhammassa navavidhassa api vā lokuttara dhammassa anudhamma bhūtanti adhigamāya

original: anurūpadhammabhūtaṃ. Anucchavikappaṭipadanti ca tameva vipassanādhammamāha, chabbidhā
analyzed: anurūpa dhamma bhūtam ca tam eva vipassanā dhammam āha chabbidhā

original: visuddhiyo vā. Anudhammanti tassā yathāvuttappaṭipadāya anurūpaṃ abhisallekhitaṃ
analyzed: visuddhiyaḥ vā tassāḥ yathā vutta paṭipadāya anurūpam abhisallekhitam

original: appichatādidhammaṃ. Caraṇasīlāti samādāya vattanasīlā. Anumaggaphaladhammo etissāti
analyzed: appiccha tā ādi dhammam caraṇa sīlā ati samādāya vattana sīlā anumagga phala dhammaḥ etissa ati

original: vā anudhammā, vuṭṭhānagāminī vipassanā. Tassā caraṇasīlā. Attano ācariyavādanti attano
analyzed: vā anudhammā vuṭṭhāna gāminī vipassanā tassā caraṇa sīlā attano ācariya vādanti attano

original: ācariyassa sammāsambuddhassa vādaṃ. Sadevakassa lokassa ācārasikkhāpanena ācariyo,
analyzed: ācariyassa sammāsambuddhassa vādam sa devakassa lokassa ācāra sikkhāpanena ācariyo

original: bhagavā, tassa vādo, catusaccadesanā.
analyzed: bhagavā tassa vādo catu sacca desanā

original: Ācikkhissantīti ādito kathessanti, attanā uggahitaniyāmena pare uggaṇhāpessantīti
analyzed: ācikkhissanti iti āditas kathessanti attanā uggahita niyāmena pare uggaṇhāpessanti iti

original: attho. Desessantīti vācessanti, pāḷiṃ sammā pabodhessantīti attho. Paññapessantīti
analyzed: attho desessanti iti vācessanti pāḷim sammā pabodhessanti iti attho paññapessanti iti

original: pajānāpessanti, saṅkāsessantīti attho. Paṭṭhapessantīti pakārehi ṭhapessanti, pakāsessantīti
analyzed: pajānāpessanti saṅkāsessanti iti attho paṭṭhapessanti iti pakārehi ṭhapessanti pakāsessanti iti

original: attho. Vivarissantīti vivaṭaṃ karissanti. Vibhajissantīti vibhattaṃ karissanti. Uttānīkarissantīti
analyzed: atthaḥ vivarissanti iti vivaṭam karissanti vibhajissanti iti vibhattam karissanti uttānīkarissanti iti

original: anuttānaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissanti. Sahadhammenāti ettha dhamma-saddo
analyzed: anuttānam gambhīram uttānam pākaṭam karissanti sahadhammena ati ettha dhamma saddaḥ

original: kāraṇapariyāyo “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “sahetukena sakāraṇena
analyzed: kāraṇa pariyāyaḥ hetumhi ñāṇam dhamma paṭisambhidā ti ādīsu viyā ti āha sa hetukena sa kāraṇena

original: vacanenā”ti. Sappāṭihāriyanti sanissaraṇaṃ. Yathā paravādaṃ bhañjitvā sakavādo patiṭṭhahati,
analyzed: vacanena ati sa pāṭihāriyanti sa nissaraṇam yathā paravādam bhañjitvā saka vādaḥ patiṭṭhahati

original: evaṃ hetudāharaṇehi yathādhigatamatthaṃ sampādetvā dhammaṃ kathessanti. Tenāha “niyyānikaṃ
analyzed: evam hetu dāharaṇehi yathā adhigatam attham sampādetvā dhammam kathessanti tena āha niyyānikam

original: katvā dhammaṃ desessantī”ti, navavidhaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ pabodhessantīti attho. Ettha
analyzed: katvā dhammam desessanti iti navavidham lokuttara dhammam pabodhessanti iti atthaḥ ettha

original: ca “paññapessantī”tiādīhi chahi padehi cha atthapadāni dassitāni, ādito pana dvīhi
analyzed: ca paññapessanti itiādīhi chahi padehi cha attha padāni dassitāni āditaḥ pana dvīhi

analyzed: padehi cha byañjana padāni ettāvatā tepiṭakam buddha vacanam saṃvaṇṇanā nayena saṅgahetvā

original: dassitaṃ hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ nettiyaṃ “dvādasa padāni suttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ byañjanañca attho cā”ti.
analyzed: dassitam hoti vuttam ha etam nettiyam dvādasa padāni suttam tam sabbam byañjanam ca attho ca ati

original: Sikkhāttayasaṅgahitanti adhisīlasikkhādisikkhāttayasaṅgahaṃ. Sakalaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyanti
analyzed: sikkhāttaya saṅgahitanti adhi sīla sikkhā ādi sikkhāttaya saṅgaham sakalam sāsana brahmacariyanti

original: tehi tehi bhikkhūhi samadhigatajjhānasukhavasena. Vuddhippattanti uḷārapaṇītabhāvūpagamena
analyzed: tehi tehi bhikkhūhi samadhigata jhāna sukha vasena vuddhi ppattanti uḷāra paṇīta bhāva upagamena

original: sabbaso parivuddhimupagataṃ. Sabbapāliphullaṃ viya abhiññāsampattivasena abhiññāsampadāhi
analyzed: sabbaso parivuddhim upagatam sabba pāliphullam viya abhiññā sampatti vasena

original: sāsanābhivuddhiyā matthakappattito. Patiṭṭhitavasenāti patiṭṭhānavasena, patiṭṭhappattiyāti

analyzed: attho paṭivedha vasena bahunaḥ janassa hitanti bāhujaññam tena āha mahājana abhisamaya vasena ati

original: Puthu puthulaṃ bhūtaṃ jātaṃ, puthu vā puthuttaṃ pattanti puthubhūtaṃ. Tenāha “sabbā…pe...
analyzed: puthu puthulam bhūtam jātam puthu vā puthuttam pattanti puthubhūtam tena āha sabbāpe

original: patta”nti. Suṭṭhu pakāsitanti suṭṭhu sammadeva ādikalyāṇādibhāvena paveditaṃ.
analyzed: suṭṭhu pakāsitanti suṭṭhu sammadeva ādi kalyāṇa ādi bhāvena paveditam

original: Satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvāti ayaṃ kāyādivibhāgo attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro mayā ettakaṃ
analyzed: satim su upaṭṭhitam katvā iti ayam kāya ādi vibhāgaḥ atta bhāva saññitaḥ dukkha bhāraḥ mayā ettakam

original: kālaṃ vahito, idāni pana na vahitabbo, etassa avahanatthañhi cirataraṃ kālaṃ ariyamaggasambhāro
analyzed: kālam vahitaḥ idāni pana na vahitabbaḥ etassa a vahana attham hi cirataram kālam ariya magga sambhāraḥ

original: sammadeva pariññātāti catubbidhampi sammāsatiṃ yatātathaṃ visaye suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitaṃ

original: katvā. Ñāṇena paricchinditvāti imassa attabhāvasaññitassa dukkhabhārassa vahane payojanabhūtaṃ

analyzed: atta hitam tāva bodhi mūle eva parisamāpitam para hitam pana buddha veneyya vinayam parisamāpitabbam

original: taṃ idāni māsattayeneva parisamāpanaṃ pāpuṇissati, ahampi visākhāpuṇṇamāyaṃ parinibbāyissāmīti

analyzed: evam buddha ñāṇena paricchinditvā sabba bhāgena nicchayam katvā āyu saṅkhāram vissajji iti

original: Taṃvissajjaneneva tena abhisaṅkhariyamānaṃ jīvitasaṅkhāraṃ “na pavattessāmī”ti vissajji.

original: Tenāha “tatthā”tiādi.
analyzed: tena āha tattha atiādi

original: Ṭhānamahantatāyapi pavattiākāramahantatāyapi mahanto pathavīkampo. Tattha ṭhānamahantatāya

analyzed: bhūmicālassa mahanta ttam dassetum tadā kirape kampittha iti vuttam sā pana

original: dasasahassī lokadhātu eva, na yā kāci. Yā mahābhinīhāramahābhijātiādīsupi kampittha,
analyzed: dasa sahassī lokadhātu eva na yā kāci yā mahā abhinīhāra mahā abhijāti ādīsu pi

analyzed: tāvattakam eva jāti khettam ahosi tathā hi vuttam dasa sahassī lokadhātu nissaddā

analyzed: bhaya janakā iti deva bheriyā iti deva dundubhi saddassa pariyāya vacana mattam na ca ittha

analyzed: kasmā itiādi vuttam

analyzed: paricchinnam tathā hi tam paritas khaṇḍita bhāvena parittanti vuccati paṭipakkha vikkhambhanato

analyzed: niyaka jjhatta rataḥ ti sa santāna dhammesu vipassanā vasena gocara āsevanāya ca nirataḥ sa vipākam pi

analyzed: samānam pavatti vipāka matta dāyi kammam sa vipāka ṭṭhena sambhavam na ca tam kāma ādi bhava abhisaṅkhārakam ti

analyzed: ajjhattaratas samāhitaḥ iti

analyzed: tathā katvā vigate udaka sandhāraka vātaḥ punar ābandhitvā gaṇhāti yathā tam udakam

analyzed: na bhassati evam upatthambhentam ābandhana vitāna vasena bandhitvā gaṇhāti tatas udakam

analyzed: sakalā hi mahā pathavī tadā oggacchati ca uggacchati ca kampanam na paññāyati

analyzed: anubhavitabbassa issariya sampatti ādikassa parittā ati

original: paṭiladdhamattā nātisubhāvitā. Tathā ca bhāvanā balavatī na hotīti āha “dubbalā”ti.

original: vuttanayena veditabbā. Tattha vimuttiparipācanīyehi dhammehi āsaye paripācite sodhite
analyzed: vutta nayena veditabbā tattha vimutti paripācanīyehi dhammehi āsaye paripācite sodhite

original: vipassanāya maggagabbhaṃ gaṇhantiyā paripākaṃ gacchantiyā cetovimutti paripakkā nāma

original: hoti, tadabhāve aparipakkā.
analyzed: tad abhāve aparipakkā

original: Katame pana vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā? Saddhindriyādīnaṃ visuddhikaraṇavasena pannarasa dhammā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
analyzed: katame pana vimutti paripācanīyāḥ dhammāḥ saddhi indriya ādīnam visuddhi karaṇa vasena pannarasa dhammāḥ veditabbāḥ vuttam ha etam

original: “Assaddhe puggale parivajjayato, saddhe puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, pasādanīye suttante paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi saddhindriyaṃ visujjhati.
analyzed: assaddhe puggale parivajjayataḥ saddhe puggale sevataḥ bhajataḥ payirupāsataḥ pasādanīye suttante paccavekkhataḥ imehi tīhākārehi saddhi indriyam visujjhati

original: “Kusīte puggale parivajjayato, āraddhavīriye puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, sammappadhāne paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi vīriyindriyaṃ visujjhati.
analyzed: kusīte puggale parivajjayataḥ āraddha vīriye puggale sevataḥ bhajataḥ payirupāsataḥ sammappadhāne paccavekkhataḥ imehi tīhākārehi vīriya indriyam visujjhati

original: “Muṭṭhassatī puggale parivajjayato, upaṭṭhitassatī puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, satipaṭṭhāne paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi satindriyaṃ visujjhati.
analyzed: muṭṭhassatī puggale parivajjayataḥ upaṭṭhitassatī puggale sevataḥ bhajataḥ payirupāsataḥ sati paṭṭhāne paccavekkhataḥ imehi tīha ākārehi sati indriyam visujjhati

original: “Asamāhite puggale parivajjayato, samāhite puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, jhānavimokkhe paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi samādhindriyaṃ visujjhati.
analyzed: asamāhite puggale parivajjayataḥ samāhite puggale sevataḥ bhajataḥ payirupāsataḥ jhāna vimokkhe paccavekkhataḥ imehi tīhākārehi samādhi indriyam visujjhati

original: “Duppaññe puggale parivajjayato, paññavante puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi paññindriyaṃ visujjhati.
analyzed: duppaññe puggale parivajjayataḥ paññavante puggale sevataḥ bhajataḥ payirupāsataḥ gambhīra ñāṇa cariyam paccavekkhataḥ imehi tīhākārehi paññindriyam visujjhati

original: “Iti ime pañca puggale parivajjayato, pañca puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, pañca suttante paccavekkhato imehi pannarasahi ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni visujjhantī”ti.
analyzed: iti ime pañca puggale parivajjayataḥ pañca puggale sevataḥ bhajataḥ payirupāsataḥ pañca suttante paccavekkhataḥ imehi pannarasahi ākārehi imāni pañca indriyāni visujjhanti iti

original: Aparehipi pannarasahi ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni visujjhanti. Aparepi pannarasa

analyzed: santuṭṭhaḥ uva hoti ayam assa cīvare yathā sāruppa santoso

original: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātam labhati lūkham vā paṇītam vā so tena iva yāpeti aññam

original: na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti, ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathālābhasantoso. Atha pana

analyzed: cīvaram viya tesam da tvā tesam vā sesakam attanā piṇḍāya caritvā missaka āhāram vā

original: bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathāsāruppasantoso.

original: so teneva santussati, puna aññaṃ sundarataraṃ pāpuṇāti, taṃ na gaṇhāti, ayamassa

original: puttassa mātusaññā, mātu ca putte puttasaññā paccupaṭṭhitāti keci.

original: Apicettha uttarakurukānaṃ puññānubhāvasiddho ayampi viseso veditabbo. Tattha kira

original: sāliṃ akaṇaṃ athusaṃ suddhaṃ sugandhaṃ taṇḍulapphalaṃ paribhuñjanti. Taṃ bhuñjantānaṃ

original: vā paccatthikānaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ. Tesaṃ pana hananaṃ pāṭihāriyehi abhibhavanaṃ appaṭibhānatākaraṇaṃ
analyzed: vā paccatthikānam añña titthiyānam tesam pana hananam pāṭihāriyehi abhibhavanam appaṭibhāna tā karaṇam

original: Yathākammūpage satte passatā. Savāsanānamāsavānaṃ khīṇattā arahatā. Abhiññeyyādibhede

original: Atha vā tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇatāya jānatā. Kāyakammādivasena tiṇṇampi kammānaṃ

analyzed: ñāṇa anuparivattitaḥ nisamma kāritāya passatā dava ādīnam pi abhāva sādhikāya pahāna sampadāya

analyzed: evam dasa bala aṭṭhārasa āveṇika buddha dhamma vasena api yojanā kātabbā

original: Abhisaṅkhatanti attano paccayehi abhisammukhabhāvena samecca sambhuyya kataṃ. Svāssa
analyzed: abhisaṅkhatanti attanaḥ paccayehi abhisammukha bhāvena samecca sambhuyya katam

analyzed: kata bhāvaḥ uppādanena veditabbaḥ na uppannassa paṭisaṅkharaṇena ati āha uppāditam ti

original: Te cassa paccayā cetanāpadhānāti dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayita”nti

original: vuttanti “cetayitaṃ kappayita”nti atthamāha. Abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayitanti ca

original: taṃ hutvā paṭiveti. Tenāha pāḷiyaṃ “yaṃ kho panā”tiādi. Samathavipassanādhamme ṭhitoti

original: Tattha sukhumā apekkhā vuttā. Yā nikantīti vuccati.
analyzed: tattha sukhumā apekkhā vuttā yā nikantī iti vuccati

original: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ yathārutavaseneva imassa suttapadassa atthe gahetabbe sati. Samathavipassanāsu
analyzed: evam santā iti evam yathāruta vasena iva imassa sutta padassa atthe gahetabbe sati samatha vipassanāsu

analyzed: tathā sati tena anāgāmi phalam pi laddhabbam eva hoti tena āha anāgāmi phalam paṭiladdham

original: bhavissatī”ti. Sabhāvato rasitabbattā aviparīto attho eva attharaso.

original: Aññāpi kāci sugatiyoti vinipātike sandhāyāha. Aññāpi kāci duggatiyoti asurakāyamāha.

original: sammadakkhāto”ti evaṃ pavattapucchāvasena. Amatuppattiatthenāti amatabhāvassa uppattihetutāya,

original: sabbānipi kammaṭṭhānāni ekarasāpi amatādhigamassa paṭipattiyāti attho. Evamettha

analyzed: pañca satam sesam ettha uttānam eva

analyzed: gopāla sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 17. Sattame tisso kathāti tisso aṭṭhakathā, tividhā suttassa atthavaṇṇanāti attho.
analyzed: sattame tissaḥ kathā ati tissaḥ aṭṭhakathā tividhā suttassa attha vaṇṇanā ti attho

original: Ekekaṃ padaṃ nāḷaṃ mūlaṃ etissāti evaṃsaññitā ekanāḷikā. Ekekaṃ vā padaṃ nāḷaṃ atthaniggamanamaggo
analyzed: ekekam padam nāḷam mūlam etissa ati evaṃsaññitā eka nāḷikā ekekam vā padam nāḷam attha niggamana maggaḥ

original: Ekekassapi padassa piṇḍatthadassanavasena bahūnaṃ padānaṃ ekajjhaṃ atthaṃ akathetvā

original: Nīlamakkhikāti piṅgalamakkhikā, khuddakamakkhikā eva vā. Saṭati rujati etāyāti sāṭikā, saṃvaḍḍhā sāṭikā āsāṭikā. Tenāha “vaḍḍhantī”tiādi. Hāretāti apanetā.

original: Vākenāti vākapaṭṭena. Cīrakenāti pilotikena. Antovasseti vassakālassa abbhantare.
analyzed: vākena ati vākapaṭṭena cīrakena ati pilotikena antovasseti vassa kālassa abbhantare

original: Niggāhanti susumārādiggāharahitaṃ. Pītanti pānīyassa pītabhāvaṃ. Sīhabyagghādiparissayena

original: sāsaṅko sappaṭibhayo.
analyzed: sa āsaṅkaḥ sa paṭibhayo

original: Pañca ahāni ekassāti pañcāhiko, so eva vāroti, pañcāhikavāro. Evaṃ sattāhikavāropi veditabbo. Ciṇṇaṭṭhānanti caritaṭṭhānaṃ gocaraggahitaṭṭhānaṃ.

original: Pitiṭṭhānanti pitarā kātabbaṭṭhānaṃ, pitarā kātabbakiccanti attho. Yathāruciṃ gahetvā

original: gacchantīti gunnaṃ rucianurūpaṃ gocarabhūmiṃ vā nadipāraṃ vā gahetvā gacchanti. Gobhattanti

analyzed: dasa āyatanāni pañcadasa sukhuma rūpāni iti evam rūpa kaṇḍapāḷiyam āgatā pañcavīsati rūpa koṭṭhāsā ati

original: salakkhaṇato aññamaññasaṅkarābhāvato rūpabhāgā. Rūpakoṭṭhāsāti vā visuṃ visuṃ appavattitvā

original: Seyyathāpītiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Tattha rūpaṃ pariggahetvāti yathāvuttaṃ rūpaṃ salakkhaṇato
analyzed: seyyathā api itiādi upamā saṃsandanam tattha rūpam pariggahetvā ti yathā vuttam rūpam salakkhaṇato

original: ñāṇena pariggaṇhitvā. Arūpaṃ vavatthapetvāti taṃ rūpaṃ nissāya ārammaṇañca katvā

original: pavattamāne vedanādike cattāro khandhe arūpanti vavatthapetvā. Rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvāti
analyzed: pavattamāne vedanā ādike cattāraḥ khandhe arūpanti vavatthapetvā rūpa arūpam pariggahetvā ati

original: puna tattha yaṃ rūppanalakkhaṇaṃ, taṃ rūpaṃ. Tadaññaṃ arūpaṃ. Ubhayavinimuttaṃ kiñci
analyzed: puna tattha yam rūppana lakkhaṇam tam rūpam tad aññam arūpam ubhaya vinimuttam kiñci

original: sāsane thirabhāvappattā ananuggahetabbe sabrahmacārī anuggaṇhanti, niratthakaṃ vā
analyzed: sāsane thira bhāva pattāḥ an anuggahetabbe sabrahmacārī anuggaṇhanti niratthakam vā

original: anuggahaṃ karonti. Tenāha “navake bhikkhū”tiādi. Dhammakathābandhanti paveṇiāgataṃ
analyzed: anuggaham karonti tena āha navake bhikkhu iti ādi paveṇi āgatam

original: pakiṇṇakadhammakathāmaggaṃ. Saccasattappaṭisandhipaccayākārappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ suññatādīpanaṃ
analyzed: pakiṇṇaka dhamma kathā maggam sacca satta paṭisandhi paccaya ākāra ppaṭisaṃyuttam suñña tā dīpanam

original: guḷhaganthaṃ. Vuttavipallāsavasenāti “na rūpaññū”tiādīsu vuttassa paṭisedhassa paṭikkhepavasena
analyzed: guḷha gantham vutta vipallāsa vasena āti na rūpaññu ti ādīsu vuttassa paṭisedhassa paṭikkhepa vasena

original: aggahaṇavasena. Yojetvāti “rūpaññū hotīti gaṇanato vā vaṇṇato vā rūpaṃ jānātī”tiādinā,
analyzed: aggahaṇa vasena yojetvā ati rūpa ññū hoti iti gaṇanataḥ vā vaṇṇataḥ vā rūpam jānāti itiādinā

original: “tassa gogaṇopi na parihāyati, pañcagorasaparibhogatopi na paribāhiro hotī”tiādinā
analyzed: tassa go gaṇaḥ api na parihāyati pañca go rasa paribhogataḥ api na hoti iti ādinā

original: ca atthaṃ yojetvā. Veditabboti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pade yathārahaṃ attho veditabbo. Sesaṃ
analyzed: ca attham yojetvā veditabbo iti tasmin tasmin pade yathāraham atthaḥ veditabbo sesam

original: sabbattha uttānamevāti.
analyzed: sabbattha uttānam eva ati

original: Gopālasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: gopāla sutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Iti manorathapūraṇiyā aṅguttaranikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: iti manorathapūraṇiyā aṅguttara nikāya aṭṭhakathāya

original: Ekādasakanipātavaṇṇanāya anuttānatthadīpanā samattā.
Niṭṭhitā ca manorathapūraṇiyā aṅguttaranikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: niṭṭhitā ca manorathapūraṇiyā aṅguttara nikāya aṭṭhakathāya

original: Anuttānatthapadavaṇṇanā.
Nigamanakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: nigamana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Mahāaṭṭhakathāya sāranti aṅguttaramahāaṭṭhakathāya sāraṃ. Ekūnasaṭṭhimattoti thokaṃ
analyzed: mahā aṭṭhakathāya sāranti aṅguttara mahā aṭṭhakathāya sāram thokam

original: ūnabhāvato mattasaddaggahaṇaṃ. Mūlaṭṭhakathāsāranti pubbe vuttaaṅguttaramahāaṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: ūna bhāvataḥ matta sadda gahaṇam mūla aṭṭhakathā sāranti pubbe vutta aṅguttara mahā aṭṭhakathāya

original: sārameva anunigamavasena vadati. Atha vā mūlaṭṭhakathāsāranti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu atthasāraṃ.
analyzed: sāram eva anunigama vasena vadati atha vā mūla aṭṭhakathā sāranti porāṇa aṭṭhakathāsu attha sāram

original: Tenedaṃ dasseti – aṅguttaramahāaṭṭhakathāya atthasāraṃ ādāya imaṃ manorathapūraṇiṃ
analyzed: tena idam dasseti aṅguttara mahā aṭṭhakathāya attha sāram ādāya imam manoratha pūraṇim

original: karonto sesamahānikāyānampi mūlaṭṭhakathāsu idha viniyogakkhamaṃ atthasāraṃ ādāya
analyzed: karontaḥ sesa mahā nikāyānam pi mūla ṭṭhakathāsu idha viniyoga kkhamam attha sāram ādāya

original: evamakāsinti. Mahāvihārādhivāsīnanti ca idaṃ purimapacchimapadehi saddhiṃ sambandhitabbaṃ
analyzed: evam akāsinti mahāvihāra adhivāsīnam ti ca idam purima pacchima padehi saddhim sambandhitabbam

original: “mahāvihārādhivāsīnaṃ samayaṃ pakāsayantī, mahāvihārādhivāsīnaṃ mūlaṭṭhakathāsāraṃ
analyzed: mahā vihāra adhivāsīnam samayam pakāsayantī mahā vihāra adhivāsīnam mūla ṭṭhakathā sāram

original: ādāyā”ti. Tenāti puññena. Hotu sabbo sukhī lokoti kāmāvacarādivibhāgo sabbo sattaloko
analyzed: ādāya ati tena ati puññena hotu sabbo sukhī loko ti kāmāvacara ādi vibhāgo sabbo satta loko

original: yathārahaṃ bodhittayādhigamavasena sampattena nibbānasukhena sukhī sukhito hotūti
analyzed: yathāraham bodhi ttayā adhigama vasena sampattena nibbāna sukhena sukhī sukhitaḥ hotu uti

original: sadevakassa lokassa accantaṃ sukhādhigamāya attano puññaṃ pariṇāmeti.
analyzed: sa devakassa lokassa accantam sukha adhigamāya attano puññam pariṇāmeti

original: Ettāvatā samattāva, sabbaso vaṇṇanā ayaṃ;
analyzed: ettāvatā samattā ava sabbasas vaṇṇanā ayam

original: Vīsatiyā sahassehi, ganthehi parimāṇato.
analyzed: vīsatiyā sahassehi ganthehi parimāṇato

original: Porāṇānaṃ kathāmagga-sāramettha yato ṭhitaṃ;
analyzed: porāṇānam kathā magga sāram ettha yatas ṭhitam

original: Tasmā sāratthamañjūsā, iti nāmena vissutā.
analyzed: tasmai sāratthamañjūsā iti nāmena vissutā

original: Ajjhesito narindena, sohaṃ parakkamabāhunā;
analyzed: ajjhesitaḥ narindena saḥ aham parakkama bāhunā

original: Saddhammaṭṭhitikāmena, sāsanujjotakārinā.
analyzed: saddhamma ṭṭhiti kāmena sāsanujjota kārinā

original: Teneva kārite ramme, pāsādasatamaṇḍite;
analyzed: tena iva kārite ramme pāsāda sata maṇḍite

original: Nānādumagaṇākiṇṇe, bhāvanābhiratālaye.
analyzed: nānā duma gaṇa ākiṇṇe bhāvanā abhirata ālaye

original: Sītalūdakasampanne, vasaṃ jetavane imaṃ;
analyzed: sītalūdaka sampanne vasam jetavane imam

original: Atthabyañjanasampannaṃ, akāsiṃ sādhusammataṃ.
analyzed: attha byañjana sampannam sādhu sammatam

original: Yaṃ siddhaṃ iminā puññaṃ, yaṃ caññaṃ pasutaṃ mayā;
analyzed: yam siddham iminā puññam yam caññam pasutam mayā

original: Etena puññakammena, dutiye attasambhave.
analyzed: etena puñña kammena dutiye atta sambhave

original: Tāvatiṃse pamodento, sīlācāraguṇe rato;
analyzed: sīla ācāra guṇe rataḥ

original: Alaggo pañcakāmesu, patvāna paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ.
analyzed: alaggo pañca kāmesu patvāna paṭhamam phalam

original: Antime attabhāvamhi, metteyyaṃ munipuṅgavaṃ;
analyzed: antime atta bhāvamhi metteyyam muni puṅgavam

original: Lokaggapuggalaṃ nāthaṃ, sabbasattahite rataṃ.
Disvāna tassa dhīrassa, sutvā saddhammadesanaṃ;
analyzed: disvāna tassa dhīrassa sutvā saddhamma desanam

original: Adhigantvā phalaṃ aggaṃ, sobheyyaṃ jinasāsanaṃ.
analyzed: adhigantvā phalam aggam sobheyyam jina sāsanam

original: Sadā rakkhantu rājāno, dhammeneva imaṃ pajaṃ;
analyzed: sadā rakkhantu rājānaḥ dhammena iva imam pajam

original: Niratā puññakammesu, jotentu jinasāsanaṃ.
analyzed: niratā puñña kammesu jotentu jina sāsanam

original: Ime ca pāṇino sabbe, sabbadā nirupaddavā;
analyzed: ime ca pāṇinaḥ sabbe sabbadā nirupaddavā

original: Niccaṃ kalyāṇasaṅkappā, pappontu amataṃ padanti.
analyzed: niccam kalyāṇa saṅkappā pappontu amatam padanti

original: Aṅguttaraṭīkā samattā.
analyzed: aṅguttara ṭīkā samattā
